title: Amacayacu National Park
extract:
Amacayacu National Park is an enormous protected area of rainforest in the deep south of the Colombian Amazon.


Understand
Park pages at parquesnacionales.gov.co


History


Landscape


Flora and fauna


Climate


Get in
 

From Leticia : Express boats depart to Caballococha 3 to 5 times a day and will drop you at the park entrance (COP$22,000, 1hr 40min).
From Peru : if you're coming down the river from Iquitos, whether on the fast boat or the slow one, you ll save time and money by first stopping in Caballococha and transferring on the fast boat that goes to Leticia and asking to be dropped at the park. You ll do the immigration formalities when you arrive in Leticia.
